message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product, which I believe would be incredibly valuable to you.  Given its features and benefits, I'm initially proposing a price of $13,500.  What are your thoughts?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I believe this price is more reasonable considering the market value of similar products.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer.  While I understand your perspective on the market value, this product offers unique advantages that I believe justify a higher price point. I'm willing to come down slightly to $12,200.  This offer reflects a fair compromise, don't you think?

I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $11,500. I think this is a fair compromise considering the market value and the unique advantages of the product.
